title: Black screen in champ select
body: Riot please fix your game, I've gotten the black screen in champ select 3 times already. When I have the client on screen I can get into champ select just fine, when I'm using chrome or another application and it's in the background I get a black screen. Pls fix I don't want to get banned for leaving because of this nonsense

replies.body:
Damn, I'm sorry to hear this got you 3 times at this point. This is a [**known issue**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/MihNFhcV-hot-issue-black-screen-during-champion-select-beta-client) in the Beta Client that only occurs between the transition from the queue to champ select. Some players have reported a workaround that involves collapsing your friends list groups **before** you queue up for a match, as shown below:

(Click to enlarge)
https://imgur.com/a/GJulP

I recommend testing that workaround in a custom match to avoid any penalties. Please let me know if this workaround ended up working for you too.
